name: Ovens of Hell
description:
Explore a concentration camp with a first-person perspective and extraordinary, photorealistic graphics.

Gather trust of the prisoners and guards through reputation system which allows you to get access to useful tools and items.



Play dice, 'Fleas Race' or engage melee combat with other prisoners for food and water which are essential to survive.

Learn from other people how to craft and use various items which could be useful in escape.



Meet famous and historical figures who shaped the history of Europe during the war and camp, such as - Captain Pilecki, Heinrich Himmler or Doctor Mengele.

Escape the camp by any means necessary and using different paths, each one of them results in unique ending.



Play with your friends in Co-Op mode and run away from the camp together
